name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a skilled Senior Python Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in building scalable architecture and model inference APIs using **Python**, **FastAPI**, and **React**. My technical expertise encompasses cloud services like **AWS**, including **ECS** and **Fargate**, as well as containerization with **Docker** and CI/CD automation, ensuring efficient deployment of high-performance solutions. I have a deep understanding of **ML** and **NLP**, and I have successfully integrated these capabilities into applications aligned with compliance standards.
Throughout my career, I have led the development of enterprise-grade platforms in the healthcare and financial sectors, leveraging advanced **data processing** techniques and serving machine learning models in production. My strong foundation in microservices architecture and event-driven systems allows me to design robust and secure applications, while my hands-on experience with tools like MLflow, Airflow, and Kubeflow enables me to implement effective MLOps workflows.

Incorporated efficient testing strategies utilizing tools like Jest and PyTest, ensuring full coverage of unit, integration, and E2E tests for robust application development.
Integrated cloud-based services such as **AWS** and **Azure**, optimizing cloud infrastructure setups for enhanced accessibility and performance of healthcare and fintech applications.
Collaborated closely with data scientists to enhance model deployment processes, using **ML** technologies to ensure validated outputs through continuous evaluation and adjustment.
